meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Emilie Bruchon Jeremy Proctor Sean Scarry Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4128.

td.p: Emilie Bruchon, an international relations specialist from Arlington, Virginia
Jeremy Proctor, an actor from New York, New York
Sean Scarry, a substitute teacher and graduate student from Mount Laurel, New Jersey (whose 1-day cash winnings total $26,200)

tr.td: HAIL TO THE CHIEF
STEVE MARTIN
STUCK HERE IN "L"
UTAH
NOSE WORKS
FIX THE MALAPROP

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'His middle name, Baines, was his mother\'s maiden name')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: His middle name, Baines, was his mother's maiden name

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [After revealing Jeremy\'s response] He spent a lot of time working with the hearing impaired. Married a woman who was hearing impaired, I believe.)

$6,000

$3,201

$9,000
Alexander Graham Bell')

tr.td: HISTORIC PEOPLE
He once said, "If I can make a deaf-mute talk, I can make metal talk"
Sean
Jeremy
Emilie
3rd place: $1,000
2nd place: $2,000
New champion: $12,001

Jeremy
Emilie

21 R
(including 1 DD),
4 W
(including 2 DDs)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
